channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists uncover a hidden power source inside a monster black hole
item.description: Scientists have simulated how M87*, the supermassive black hole at the center of the galaxy M87, powers its immense particle jet. The Frankfurt team’s...

item.title: Scientists just proved the moai could walk, solving a 500-year mystery
item.description: Researchers confirmed that Rapa Nui’s moai statues could “walk” upright using a rocking motion, aided by rope and just a few people. Experiments with ...

item.title: Gaia solves the mystery of tumbling asteroids and reveals what’s inside them
item.description: By combining Gaia’s massive asteroid dataset with AI modeling, scientists discovered that asteroid rotation depends on how often they’ve been hit. A m...

item.title: Hubble captures a galaxy that glows in blue and gold
item.description: Hubble captured a breathtaking view of NGC 6000, a spiral galaxy where blue newborn stars shine beside golden, aging ones. The image also reveals trac...

item.title: The Red Sea that vanished and the catastrophic flood that brought it back
item.description: Researchers at KAUST have confirmed that the Red Sea once vanished entirely, turning into a barren salt desert before being suddenly flooded by waters...
